Summary: Right in front of my eyes a grey like round shaped with a point at the front.
divs: Sighting Details1:I was on my roof watching the stars about 30 feet above the ground. 2:This might sound weired but I said I know your out there and come to me , and right after those words came from my mouth The UF0 came infront of me. 3:Showing me that their out there And also responded to me. 4:I know for a fact their was no plane, no other form of craft was even near it. It moved sighlently and slowly with no lights so i couldnt be seen i suppose, it moved about a 50feet or so then shot at a super fast speed nothing like i have ever seen before nothing on this planet can move as fast as wat i seen today. 5.shocked, and nervos. 6.shot at a very high speed.
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Lapeer
